chapter.title: Choose your WIFT Chapter
chapter.subtitle: WIFT Africa is a growing network of women shaping the future of film, television, and digital storytelling across the continent. Connect to your local WIFT chapter or join WIFT Africa HQ.
chapter.member_status_title: Are you an active member of a chapter?
chapter.note_existing: I want to sign up and connect with my chapter
chapter.note_new: I want to create my profile and find a chapter
chapter.note_new_warning: Note: Registration is intended for active chapter members. Users without an affiliated chapter may experience a longer verification period.
chapter.intro_text: Choose the chapter closest to where you live or work. If there isn't one yet, you can join our WIFT Africa HQ network while new chapters form.
chapter.no_chapter_msg: Join WIFT Africa HQ to connect with members across regions.
chapter.verification_text: Chapter membership requires verification by local administrators. You'll receive confirmation within 24-48 hours.
chapter.hq_text: HQ registration provides access while verification is complete. Consider joining a local chapter for immediate full access.

welcome_modal.title: Welcome to WIFT Africa!
welcome_modal.subtitle: We're excited to have you join our growing community.
welcome_modal.p1: As a new member, you will be onboarded through a process managed by your chapter administrator. All memberships require verification by your local chapter team.
welcome_modal.p2: You can expect to receive an onboarding message from your chapter administrator within 48 hours, and your membership will be confirmed on the WIFT Africa platform within 24 hours thereafter.
welcome_modal.p3: We look forward to welcoming you into the network!
